faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I book an Airport transfer in advance?
faq.a1: Absolutely! We recommend booking early to secure your ride. Your driver will be punctual and monitor your flight schedule.
faq.a2: We cover the entire Barcelona Metropolitan Area and provide long-distance transfers to any destination in Catalonia (Girona, Tarragona) or rest of Spain.
faq.q3: We are a large group or have lots of luggage, do you have suitable vehicles?
faq.a3: Yes, our fleet includes spacious minivans for up to 6-7 passengers. Let us know when booking to assign the perfect vehicle.
faq.q4: Is the service available at night or on holidays?
faq.a4: We operate 24/7, 365 days a year. Whether it's an early morning flight or a late night out, we are always available.
faq.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a5: We accept cash and all major credit cards directly in the taxi for your convenience.
